design.title: Super DNN World
design.subtitle: DotNetNuke Design Challenge Community Favorite
design.bodytext: I created a custom theme for DotNetNuke around the concept of the Super Mario Brothers games. Every asset in this theme pack was hand drawn and configured to work within DNN. Yes, even the slide show of the complete first level was hand drawn.
features: Reusable designs for all module containers.

design.title: Faith
design.subtitle: Digital manipulation
design.bodytext: This work combines various photos I took combined and altered in photoshop.

design.title: St. Paul's Mini Golf Classic
design.subtitle: Flyer designed for a church miniature golf event.
design.bodytext: This was a fun project as I got to use my Wacom tablet and draw all of the graphical pieces. The church has large stained glass windows which I used as inspiration for this design.

design.title: Halloween Party Poster
design.bodytext: We decided to throw a Halloween party at work so I designed this poster as a fun way to spread the news.

design.title: Mardi Gras
design.subtitle: 2010 Mardi Gras Poster Competition.
design.bodytext: My submission for the 2010 Mardi Gras parade. The theme was famous kings and queens.

development.title: Customer selector
development.subtitle: Custom searchable drop down menu
development.bodytext: Due to the large number of results, the client needed a way to easily find the correct customer. I created a custom searchable drop down list that allowed for the display of multi-line results. This component is both WCAG AA compliant, responsive, and keyboard accessible
features: Custom searchable drop down list with multi-line results
